title: RS20264
content: After passing a major multi-year tax cut in Mid-2001 (which was sunsetted after 10 years) and a stimulus bill in 2002, Congress considered, but did not complete, work on energy tax subsidies,taxincentives for charitable giving deductions, pension diversification in the wake of the ENRON problems, and taxshelters. The House passed several bills that would make the multiyear tax cut permanent as well as a bill to speed up certainprovisions. This report will not be updated.
